meanings.definition: The act of wearing something on the body.
meanings.sent1: Her colorful wearing brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: I love her unique wearing style.
meanings.sent3: The cat's wearing of a tiny hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His wearing of confidence was evident in his posture.
meanings.sent5: The princess's royal wearing dazzled all the guests.

meanings.sent1: The long hike left him feeling very wearing.
meanings.sent2: After a busy day, she looked tired and wearing.
meanings.sent3: The endless meetings were quite wearing on the team.
meanings.sent4: The heatwave was wearing on everyone's energy levels.
meanings.sent5: The challenging puzzle proved to be mentally wearing.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of use or age.
meanings.sent1: The old book had a wearing cover.
meanings.sent2: His favorite jacket had a worn and wearing look.
meanings.sent3: The antique clock had a charmingly wearing appearance.
meanings.sent4: The weathered sign had a beautifully wearing effect.
meanings.sent5: The vintage car had a stylishly wearing exterior.
